title: Cloud Engineer - SRE
description:
**About The Role**
 As a Cloud Engineer you will be a part of our SRE and Cloud team consisting of 3 colleagues. You will step into a broad role with various fun things to start exploring and have opportunity to play a key role in ensuring the stability and reliability of mission-critical services and systems which continously process large data volumes every day. All this while working with cutting-edge technology and having opportunities for career growth.
   

  

 Some examples of your daily work will be:
   

  

* Work with our cross-functional teams to design, implement, and monitor infrastructure and software solutions that support high availability and reliability of our services. This includes monitoring, updating, automating, and scaling in our cloud-based environment (Azure).
* Develop and maintain automation tools and scripts to detect, prevent and resolve infrastructure and software issues.
* Collaborate with development teams to identify and mitigate potential reliability risks in the design and implementation of new features and services.
* Evaluate, recommend, and implement new technologies and tools to improve service reliability, performance, and scalability.
* Write clear, concise, and comprehensive documentation of service designs, configurations, and procedures.


 So, who are you?
   

  

 Ideal applicants have a genuine interest in optimizing solutions and have previous experience from a similar role within e.g. service reliability engineering, or systems administration/development. You'll understand the software development lifecycle and have knowledge of cloud computing concepts. You are also a team player, who's constantly curious in learning new things.
   

  

 Since our corporate language is English, you must have great communication skills in English.
   

  

 You have some of the following skills and experiences:
   

  

* 3+ years experience of Microsoft Azure (or AWS)
* Microsoft SQL server
* Infracstructure as Code (IaC)
* CI/CD
* Powershell & Python
* Windows & Linux server administration


 What's in it for you?
   

  

 Voyado wouldn’t be the powerful platform it is without the people behind it. We really care for our Voyadoers and some examples of what we can offer you are:
   

  

* An engaged team with a knowledge-sharing and friendly culture
* Summits on a regular basis where we hang out, workshop, discuss, and have a good time together
* Opportunities for personal growth and learning in a dynamic and supportive environment.
* Work-life balance – we don't have a long work-hours culture, we value engagement over hours worked.


 Some of our benefits:
   

  

* 30 days of vacation, so you can spend time on the things you love
* Beneficial bike lease, including e-bikes
* Breakfast buffet on Fridays
* Your choice of phone and gadget package
* 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* A wellness hour a week


 More on Voyado
   

  

 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, Voyado makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.
   

  

 We are now a company of 300+ colleagues on an exciting journey and have recently established a presence in new markets to strengthen our position in Europe. If you are ready for your next adventure and want to join our team on our expansion throughout Europe and have an interest in customer care, e-commerce, retail, and tech - we're for you!
   

  

 Ready to join the team?
   

  

 Lovely!
   

  

 Applying is super easy. Use your LinkedIn profile (or upload a resume) and answer a few click-in questions (no data entry, we promise). We'd love to get to know you and understand what makes you tick, so write a few lines about what would be an exciting challenge for you going forward. We are eager to get to know you and what you love to do, so be yourself and let that shine through in your application!
   

  

 Additional information
   

  

 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct a background check on the final candidate. We use background checks from Scandinavian Recruitment Intelligence. Here you can read more about how a background check is done.
   

  

 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, the Voyado customer experience cloud makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.

title: DevSecOps
description:
Vi är på jakt efter dig som brinner för IT-säkerhet och ser molntekniken som en avgörande del av framtidens digitala lösningar.
   

  

**Dina spännande arbetsuppgifter:**
 Som DevSecOps -specialist hos oss blir du en viktig del av vårt team, där du kommer att arbeta med att säkerställa och skydda våra kunders IT-miljöer. Din roll innebär att hantera säkerhetsstrategier, implementera säkerhetslösningar och övervaka system för att förebygga och hantera säkerhetshot. Du kommer att få möjligheten att arbeta med de senaste säkerhetsteknikerna och bidra med din expertis i en mängd olika projekt.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Solida kunskaper och erfarenhet inom DevSecOps, särskilt med fokus på Microsofts produktportfölj.
* Erfarenhet av arbete med molntjänster som Azure eller AWS.
* Stark kompetens inom nätverks- och systemadministrationsverktyg.
* Förmåga att kommunicera effektivt på svenska, både muntligt och skriftligt.


 För att trivas i denna roll bör du vara analytisk, nyfiken och ha en problemlösande inställning. Du är självgående och trivs med att arbeta både individuellt och i team. Att vara proaktiv och hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste trenderna och teknikerna inom IT-säkerhet är avgörande.
   

  

**Om B3** 
**Kodify** 
 :
   

  

 B3 Kodify är proffs på Cloud-teknologier som AWS, Azure och GCP samt metoder som DevOps/DevSecOps. Vi strävar efter att ligga i framkant när det kommer till moderna arbetssätt och vi älskar att krydda till det med moderna verktyg och tekniker som t.ex. Containers, moln, infrastruktur som kod osv. Vi är grymma på att hjälpa våra kunder att lyfta sina IT-koncept!
   

  

 Hos oss är måndagar lika uppskattade som fredagar! Vår hemlighet? Vi sätter stor vikt vid glädje, gemenskap och oförglömliga upplevelser - vare sig det är via en chatt på Slack eller genom våra gemensamma äventyr och afterworks. Och om det inte vore nog, erbjuder vi konkurrenskraftiga löner, flexibilitet i vardagen och oändliga chanser för din personliga och professionella tillväxt. Gör varje dag till en anledning att fira med oss!
   

  

 Intresserad av att bli en del av B3 Kodify? Skicka din ansökan idag! Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Jens på Jens.nilsson@b3.se
   

  

****Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!****
*B3 Kodify är en del av B3-koncernen och utnämndes till Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work. Vi är också stolta över att vara Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022. Vi tror på våra värdeord: erfarenhet, mångfald och energi, och strävar efter hållbarhet i allt vi gör. Vi tror också att glada medarbetare presterar bättre och därför arrangerar vi regelbundna aktiviteter inom wellness, alltifrån yoga och simning till musikquiz, stickcafé och föreläsningar om stress och mental hälsa.*

title: Cyber Defence Analyst - eCom
description:
**Job Description**
 Working in the H&M Cyber Defense Center eCom, you will work with world class tooling for threat hunting, detection and response based on cloud technology (For example, Azure Sentinel, Defender for Endpoint, Defender for O365, GCP SCC, Akamai, and more) with a dedicated team of DevOps engineers constantly develop tooling to support analysis, response and automations.
   

  

 Our Cyber Defense Center is the beating heart in the defense of our company, combining intelligence, monitoring, incident response and threat hunting with an engineering mindset to make the most out of people and technology.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a
 **Cyber Security Analyst** 
 in our Cyber Defense Center eCom team, you play a key role in H&M Group’s cyber Defense. You understand cyber security threats and the threat landscape, act to detect, analyze and respond to cyber-attacks, manage incidents and reduce risk to customers, colleagues, partners and the company. You will work with the team to improve the capabilities to reduce response time but at the same time maintain quality. We are taking advantage of the latest technology in intelligence and automation. Ultimately the aim is to bring value to our business by reducing risk!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 In this role you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Analyze security incidents, alerts, and events .
* Investigate incidents according to SOP: s and best practice .
* Perform remediation activities according to SOP: s and best practice.
* Interaction with stakeholders to support investigation and remediation .
* Escalation of major incidents according to SOP: s
* Support major incident response activities.
* Improve and develop detection, whitelisting, SOP:s, and automation for incident and alert handling .


**Qualifications**
* Can explain the principles of threat intelligence, modelling and assessment.
* Can explain the principles of a computer system, network and storage security architecture and how these can be used to reduce information risk
* Can explain the main principles and processes involved in conducting a compliance monitoring exercise
* Have experience with operating as a member of an CSIRT or SOC.
* Have experience with Incident management, investigation and response.
* Have experience with developing custom detection in either Bot Management, SIEM or EDR solutions and understands the logic behind it.
* Knowledge of network communication, cloud infra, OS, API:s and applications.
* + 3 years of experience as a Security Analyst or similar area.


**Specific competence**
* Experience with SIEM and logging environments for threat analysis, investigation, threat hunting and triage analysis on various security solution such as WAF, Bot Management, EDR.
* Understand attack mitigations and improvements related to OWASP
* Experience with Content Delivering Networks (CDN)
* Experience in cloud-based computing on large scale (preferably Microsoft Azure, but also GCP or AWS)
* Understanding of threat landscape, trends and act proactively on threat intelligence
* Good understanding of fundamental infrastructure components, network concepts, Operating Systems (Windows & Linux), DNS, etc.
* Willing to work in a team-oriented environment and flexibility to work in a demanding environment, sometimes under time-pressure


**Additional Information**
**Working with tech at H&M Group**
 Shaping the future of fashion with people, data, and tech. The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.
   

  

**What we offer!**
 You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want, and when you grow, we grow. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.
   

  

 This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm

title: Cloud Engineer till Skyresponse
description:
*Är du en skicklig molnspecialist som vill arbeta med spännande och effektiva lösningar inom AWS? Bli en del av Skyresponse där du får arbeta med samhällsviktig och ny teknik.*
**Om tjänsten**
 Den här tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Brillante och du anställs direkt hos Skyresponse.
   

  

  

  

**Om företaget**
 Skyresponse skapar trygghet för människor genom att säkerställa att larm och händelser åtgärdas effektivt och av rätt person genom deras molntjänst för larmhantering. Skyresponse har ett ledande nordiskt larm- och händelsesystem som används inom äldrevård, säkerhet och smarta byggnader.
   

  

  

  

 Skyresponse säkerställer, med högsta möjliga tillgänglighet, att åtgärder alltid når rätt personer, maskiner eller system genom en konfigurerbar larmregelmotor. Alla tjänster är molnbaserade, fullt skalbara och globalt tillgängliga. Via öppna APIer tillåter de partners att snabbt integrera nya enheter för larm, utbyta information och data till andra plattformar. Via deras ekosystem möjliggör vi för partners att enklare bygga egna tjänster.
   

  

  

  

 Lösningen är den snabbast växande plattformen i Norden för trygghetslarm och bolaget har börjat sin internationella tillväxtresa. Skyresponse arbetar just nu med mer än 15 kanalpartners i 9 länder och har cirka 700 företag och organisationer som använder företagets tjänster vilket varje månad genererar mer än 14 miljoner larm och händelser runt om i Europa.
   

  

  

  

 Skyresponse är ett företag i framkant när det gäller molnbaserad teknologi och säkerhetssystem. De erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsmiljö där du som cloud engineer får stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling. Du får möjligheten att arbeta med moderna lösningar i AWS-miljön och fokusera på de delar du vill utvecklas inom.
   

  

  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Som cloud engineer spelar du en central roll i utvecklingen och optimeringen av Skyresponse molnbaserade larmhanteringsplattform med fokus på infrastrukturen. Du arbetar med design och effektiva tekniska uppsättningar. Du arbetar såväl strategiskt som operativt, med uppgifter så som arkitektur/design, rådgivning och nära samarbete med utvecklingsteamet och driftansvariga för att säkerställa att plattformen är stabil och optimalt anpassad för framtida tillväxt och innovationer. Du vägleder kring lämpliga molnlösningar och säkerställer en hållbar transformation från on-prem till molnet med hänsyn till framtida anpassningar, utveckling och automation.
   

  

  

  

 I dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter ingår
   

  

  

  

* Implementering och förvaltning av molninfrastrukturer i AWS
* Arbete med databaslösningar så som MySQL, där du optimerar och underhåller system för bästa prestanda
* Aktivt deltagande i projekt för att förbättra och utveckla långsiktiga lösningar för plattformens drift och övervakning
* Övervaka och optimera infrastrukturens kostnader


**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper**
* God arbetslivserfarenhet som tekniker, eller liknande roll, inom molninfrastruktur
* Kunskap inom lagring och nätverk, inklusive design, konfiguration och säkerhet
* Goda kunskaper inom molnbaserade tekniker, databaser (MySQL) och server
* Obehindrad engelska i både tal och skrift, svenska är starkt meriterande


 För att trivas krävs en stark teknisk grund, förmågan att arbeta både självständigt och i team, samt skicklighet i att kommunicera tekniska idéer på ett klart och begripligt sätt. Din expertis är avgörande för att skapa en robust, säker och skalbar molnmiljö som uppfyller behoven. Din nyfikenhet leder dig till att aktivt utforska nya idéer och lösningar, vilket gör dig till en värdefull tillgång i teamet. Dessutom är du strukturerad och organiserad, vilket säkerställer effektivitet och noggrannhet i ditt arbete. Genom att planera och prioritera uppgifter på ett metodiskt sätt skapar du tydlighet och ordning, vilket bidrar till att uppgifter utförs med hög kvalitet.
   

  

  

  

**Övrig information**
 Start Enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

  

  

 Plats Våra kontor finns i Stockholm, Luleå och Linköping. Vi föredrar att du utgår ifrån ett av kontoren, men distansarbete inom Sverige är möjligt om du kan resa till kontoren vid behov.
   

  

  

  

 Vi gör ett löpande urval så skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Har du frågor eller funderingar är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till rekryteringsansvarig, Elice, på elice.ohman@bravura.se.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
*Är du en skicklig molnspecialist som vill arbeta med spännande och effektiva lösningar inom AWS? Bli en del av Skyresponse där du får arbeta med samhällsviktig och ny teknik.* 




  





**Om företaget** 




 Skyresponse skapar trygghet för människor genom att säkerställa att larm och händelser åtgärdas effektivt och av rätt person genom deras molntjänst för larmhantering. Skyresponse har ett ledande nordiskt larm- och händelsesystem som används inom äldrevård, säkerhet och smarta byggnader.
 



  





 Skyresponse säkerställer, med högsta möjliga tillgänglighet, att åtgärder alltid når rätt personer, maskiner eller system genom en konfigurerbar larmregelmotor. Alla tjänster är molnbaserade, fullt skalbara och globalt tillgängliga. Via öppna APIer tillåter de partners att snabbt integrera nya enheter för larm, utbyta information och data till andra plattformar. Via deras ekosystem möjliggör vi för partners att enklare bygga egna tjänster.
 



  





 Lösningen är den snabbast växande plattformen i Norden för trygghetslarm och bolaget har börjat sin internationella tillväxtresa. Skyresponse arbetar just nu med mer än 15 kanalpartners i 9 länder och har cirka 700 företag och organisationer som använder företagets tjänster vilket varje månad genererar mer än 14 miljoner larm och händelser runt om i Europa.
 



  





 Skyresponse är ett företag i framkant när det gäller molnbaserad teknologi och säkerhetssystem. De erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsmiljö där du som cloud engineer får stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling. Du får möjligheten att arbeta med moderna lösningar i AWS-miljön och fokusera på de delar du vill utvecklas inom.
 



  





 Skyresponse kontor i Sverige är belägna i Stockholm, Luleå och Linköping. De har även kontor i Ukraina och Storbritannien.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som cloud engineer spelar du en central roll i utvecklingen och optimeringen av Skyresponse molnbaserade larmhanteringsplattform med fokus på infrastrukturen. Du arbetar med design och effektiva tekniska uppsättningar. Du arbetar såväl strategiskt som operativt, med uppgifter så som arkitektur/design, rådgivning och nära samarbete med utvecklingsteamet och driftansvariga för att säkerställa att plattformen är stabil och optimalt anpassad för framtida tillväxt och innovationer. Du vägleder kring lämpliga molnlösningar och säkerställer en hållbar transformation från on-prem till molnet med hänsyn till framtida anpassningar, utveckling och automation.
 



  





 I dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter ingår:
 



 • Implementering och förvaltning av molninfrastrukturer i AWS
 



 • Arbete med databaslösningar så som MySQL, där du optimerar och underhåller system för bästa prestanda
 



 • Aktivt deltagande i projekt för att förbättra och utveckla långsiktiga lösningar för plattformens drift och övervakning
 



 • Övervaka och optimera infrastrukturens kostnader
 



  





**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper** 




 • God arbetslivserfarenhet som tekniker, eller liknande roll, inom molninfrastruktur
 



 • Kunskap inom lagring och nätverk, inklusive design, konfiguration och säkerhet
 



 • Goda kunskaper inom molnbaserade tekniker, databaser (MySQL) och server
 



 • Obehindrad engelska i både tal och skrift, svenska är starkt meriterande
 



  





 För att trivas krävs en stark teknisk grund, förmågan att arbeta både självständigt och i team, samt skicklighet i att kommunicera tekniska idéer på ett klart och begripligt sätt. Din expertis är avgörande för att skapa en robust, säker och skalbar molnmiljö som uppfyller behoven. Din nyfikenhet leder dig till att aktivt utforska nya idéer och lösningar, vilket gör dig till en värdefull tillgång i teamet. Dessutom är du strukturerad och organiserad, vilket säkerställer effektivitet och noggrannhet i ditt arbete. Genom att planera och prioritera uppgifter på ett metodiskt sätt skapar du tydlighet och ordning, vilket bidrar till att uppgifter utförs med hög kvalitet.
 



  





**Övrig information** 




**Start** 
 : Enligt överenskommelse.
 



**Plats** 
 : Våra kontor finns i Stockholm, Luleå och Linköping. Vi föredrar att du utgår ifrån ett av kontoren, men distansarbete inom Sverige är möjligt om du kan resa till kontoren vid behov.
 



**Övrigt** 
 : Den här tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Brillante och du anställs direkt hos Skyresponse.
 



  





 Vi gör ett löpande urval så skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Har du frågor eller funderingar är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till rekryteringsansvarig, Elice, på
 **elice.ohman@bravura.se** 
 .

title: ETL (Ab initio) Engineer
description:
**Would you like to join a leading Digital Solution Company and contribute to innovative solutions that are built on a daily basis?**
 Our client is a leading global provider of IT solutions and services, known for their customer-centric approach to digital transformation. With a rich history dating back to 1996, they have continually evolved to meet the changing needs of their customers. Their services encompass consulting, technology, and outsourcing, delivering innovative solutions to complex challenges. They have also been honored multiple times as a top employer, including being named a Great Place To Work from 2015 to 2023.
   

  

 You will work on a long-term project for one of the largest financial institutions in Northern Europe, known for its strong commitment to digital innovation and providing a wide range of financial services to both private and corporate clients.
   

  

**Role and responsibilities:**
* Developing graphs, plans, creating PSETS, XFR, DML in GDE (Graphical Developer Environment)
* Creating job schedules in Control Center
* Integration to Ab Initio Metadata Hub and several other toolkits
* Table creation in different technologies e.g hive, hbase, Azure SQL, Azure Storage, Teradata, Oracle


**What we expect:**
* 5+ years of similar experience
* Advance ETL and data integration experience (Ab initio, PowerCenter, DataStage..)
* Data Warehouse, Data lake, Big Data and Hadoop or Cloud working experience
* Fluent in any SQL and RDBMS systems
* Unix commands and scripting
* An extra bonus meriting would be knowledge/experience in: DevOps tools (GIT, Jenkins basics) and Azure Cloud
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field


**What we offer:**
* B2B contract or employment agreement
* Work-life balance
* Support in learning and development further while also providing multi-year career opportunities
* Stable work in a supportive team

title: Serverless Fullstack Engineer, Solna
description:
At PostNord Group IT, we build the best digital customer solutions for the Nordic markets. Some examples are PostNord Customer Portal, Skicka Direkt, PostNord app and the Postcards app. Live tracking, parcel robots and digital postage are some of the latest services we have developed.
   

  

 With us, you are met by an open and warm work environment, here we are constantly working to learn and improve. Sharing and learning by mistake is an important part of our culture.
   

  

 We work agile in a DevOps culture. The teams are the backbone of our organization and are self-governing, which means great opportunities to influence technology choices and working methods.
   

  

 The team seeking your knowledge is the Pay to PostNord Team
   

  

**The team**
 We, the Pay to PostNord Team, is responsible for PostNord Group´s digital payment solutions. These solutions are central to our growth. As a full-time developer with us you will be part of an agile team that has cutting-edge expertise in the area of payment solutions. We handle on average over 20 million transactions every year from satisfied customers from all over the Nordics.
   

  

 We are responsible for the payment solutions in their entirety - new development, product lifecycle management, solution architecture, monitoring and operation (DevOps). The ambition is to constantly be at the forefront of technology and together we help build innovative payment solutions for digital products within PostNord.
   

  

 Developers part of this team have the option to take lead on specific projects and act as a representative for the Pay to PostNord Team. The support of the team and the tech lead will always be very close if needed. This has been very appreciated by the team members.
   

  

**Some of our technologies/techniques**
* Microservices/Serverless
* Typescript/Javascript
* NodeJS
* AWS - Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, S3 to name a few.
* REST
* React/Angular/Vue
* CSS
* Grafana


**Who are you?**
 We believe that you enjoy working in an agile environment where you get great opportunities to be involved and influence the work and the technical choices. You should also love to learn about new technologies/solutions and get acquainted with new contexts since this is part of our everyday life in the Pay to PostNord Team.
   

  

 As a person, you are committed, responsible and unpretentious. We believe that you have several years of experience as a developer and preferably experience of payment solutions, solution architecture and database development.
   

  

**Your profile**
* Backend development in NodeJS (Javascript or Typescript).
* AWS or similar cloud platforms (Azure, OpenStack or Google Cloud).
* Knowledge in at least one modern frontend framework (Angular, React or Vue).
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience.
* English or Swedish in speech and writing.


**We offer you**
* To work with our modern tech stack and you are given great opportunities to influence the choice of technology.
* We aim to have a great work-life balance and we have the support of our own System Operations Team that handles any incident outside of the developers working hours.
* We encourage you to develop. For example, we sponsor you to AWS certify.
* A job where the value you deliver is important to hundreds of thousands of users.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position please send an email to petra.wahlund@postnord.com Note that we do not accept applications via email. We look forward to hearing from you.
   

  

 Union contacts, click here

title: Lead Java Developer - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Är du en nyfiken och engagerad Java utvecklare som vill ansluta sig till ett av Nordens största Tech-företag? Då är det här rollen för dig!
   

  

 Vi söker en Lead Java utvecklare som vill bli en del av Tietoevry Tech Services. Tietoevry Tech Services driver företagsomfattande transformationer av kundernas affärsprocesser, applikationer och infrastruktur.
   

  

**När du börjar på Tietoevry Tech Services som Lead Java-utvecklare:**
* Du kommer att arbeta som konsult och ingå i ett skickligt team av bl.a. utvecklare och lösningsarkitekter. I ditt kunduppdrag ingår du i ett agilt team och du förväntas ta en ledande roll kring utvecklingen i samarbete med Product Owner och Scrum Master.
* Du kommer utveckla fantastiska mjukvaruprodukter med ett helhetsansvar genom agila metoder
* Vår anpassningsbara leveransmodell innebär att du parallellt kan komma att delta i flera projekt, vilket kräver förmågan att samarbeta, koordinera och prioritera


**Vem vi söker:**
* Du har många års (ca 10+) arbetslivserfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling från Telekomsektorn eller motsvarande, alternativt erfarenhet från annan komplex IT-miljö
* Du har erfarenhet av utveckling i Java, javascript, REST API,PL/SQL, JSON, Xml, Unix och Kafka
* Du har ett naturligt affärstänk och är trygg i att jobba individuellt men samtidigt i en större kontext av agila team med DevOps, Scrum, SAFe, Jira, Code reviews, Jenkins och Github
* Du delar också gärna med dig av dina kunskaper, har ett öga för detaljer och trivs i en coachande roll
* Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Solr, JFROG artifactory, Google API, JMS, LDAP och Wildfly
* Denna tjänst kräver ett svenskt medborgarskap samt att du är flytande i Svenska och Engelska, i tal och skrift


**Vi erbjuder dig:**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Fick vi dig inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta anställande chef, Leo West, leo.west@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs snart!
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
**Om Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry skapar målmedveten teknik som återuppfinner världen för gott. Vi är ett ledande teknikföretag med ett starkt nordiskt arv och global kapacitet. Utifrån våra kärnvärderingar öppenhet, tillit och mångfald, arbetar vi med våra kunder för att utveckla digitala framtider där företag, samhällen och mänskligheten frodas.
   

  

 Våra 24 000 experter globalt är specialiserade på moln, data samt mjukvara och bistår tusentals företagskunder och offentliga kunder i mer än 90 länder. Tietoevrys årliga omsättning är cirka 3 miljarder euro och bolagets aktier är noterade på NASDAQ-börsen i Helsingfors och Stockholm samt på Oslo Børs. Bekanta dig med vad vi gör.
   

  

 Skapar målmedveten teknik för att återuppfinna världen för gott
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: .Net Senior Backend Developer
description:
Are you a seasoned Backend Developer with a knack for digital innovation and problem-solving? Join ICA and take the lead in crafting cutting-edge solutions for our digital retail environment. We're currently seeking several developers to join our teams and contribute to exciting projects and the great opportunities ahead.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 As a Senior Backend Developer at ICA, you'll be driving the development of innovative solutions that enhance customer experiences and optimize business operations. Utilizing a diverse tech stack including .Net/C#, Azure, Microservices, and CI/CD, you'll tackle challenges such as:
   

  

* Architecting scalable and resilient cloud-native applications.
* Implementing robust CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless deployment.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that meet business objectives.


**What We're Looking For:**
 We're seeking Backend Developers with a strong foundation in .Net/C# and a passion for exploring new technologies. We believe that you have:
   

  

* Extensive experience in developing cloud-native solutions, preferably using microservices architecture.
* Proficiency in DevOps practices and agile methodologies.
* Ability to communicate in both Swedish and English


 Familiarity with technologies such as REST, VUE, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Web components is a plus.
   

  

**What happens now?**
 If you have any questions about the position contact Amanda Näsman, Manager Engineering Commerce Experience, 072-220 10 11, or Charlotta Thelander, Manager Wholesale Data Management and Digital Services, 070-339 97 22. Questions about the selection process or terms & conditions at ICA please contact Markus Öhman, Recruiter, 070-695 62 04.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible as but no later than September 25, 2024.
   

  

 ICA aims to reflect our customers and society, so we strive to hire people with different backgrounds, competencies, knowledge, and experiences. We value good working environment conditions with the goal of completely smoke-free workplaces. If roles require it, you may need to undergo tests, background checks, and drug testing before employment.
   

  

 Learn more about what it's like to work at ICA.

title: Bli DW-utvecklare hos AMF!
description:
**Ta dig an en central roll inom Data Warehouse hos AMF i Stockholm! Säkerställ högkvalitativ datahantering som DW-utvecklare!**
 Som DW-utvecklare hos AMF i Stockholm får du arbeta med vårt omfattande Data Warehouse som är en nyckelfunktion för att leverera kvalitativ information för både intern och extern användning. Du kommer att vara en del av ett sammansvetsat team som ansvarar för datatillgänglighet och kvalitetssäkring. Ta chansen att arbeta i en professionell, vänlig, personlig och hjälpsam kultur där din nyfikenhet och drivkraft kommer att tas tillvara på!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
 Hos Oss Påverkar Du Många Människors Framtid – Och Får Ett Jobb Som Du Kan Vara Stolt Över Att Gå Till. Det Innebär Till Exempel
   

  

* Möjlighet till en roll där du både får fördjupa och bredda dig inom Data Warehousing.
* Att vara med och förvalta och utveckla vår DW-plattform med tillhörande arbetssätt.
* Utvecklas både professionellt och personligt i en miljö där lärande och kunskapsdelning prioriteras.
* Ett positivt samarbetsklimat – AMF präglas av samarbete och en vilja att våga testa nytt. Vi hjälps åt att växa, leverera och ha kul tillsammans.


**Det här gör du hos oss**
 I Rollen Som DW-utvecklare Arbetar Du Med Fokus På DW-plattformen Där Mängder Av Information Flödar. Det Innebär Bl.a Att
   

  

* Arbeta med effektiva och snabba inläsningar, kontroller, historisering till sammanställning för rapportering och analys.
* Med utgångspunkt i SQL server "on prem" vara med och ta steg mot Azure och cloud.
* Ingå i en central funktion på AMF där du kommer ha många kontaktytor, både med de som förser oss med data samt de som använder informationen.
* Jobba i ett välfungerande SAFe-tåg.


**Ditt team och arbetsplats**
 Du kommer att ingå i en avdelning bestående av erfarna DW-utvecklare som tillsammans utgör ett brett spann av kompetenser nödvändiga för att upprätthålla en effektiv Data warehousing inom AMF. Avdelningen består av 12 medarbetare som som brinner för Data warehouseing och att tillgängliggöra information. Arbetsmiljön är öppen och strukturerad med fokus på kvalitet och leverans. Vi jobbar agilt enligt SAFE.
   

  

 Vi sitter i väldigt trevliga lokaler centralt i Stockholm nära T-centralen. Att jobba på kontoret är utgångspunkten i AMFs riktlinjer för kontors- och distansarbete. Om det fungerar bra för verksamheten, din arbetsgrupp och dig själv, kan du jobba viss del på distans. För denna roll gäller grundprincipen att halva arbetstiden ska vara förlagd till kontoret.
   

  

**Mer om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har flera års erfarenhet av DW-utveckling och besitter en teknisk kompetens inom SQL Server. Vi ser gärna att du har en förståelse för och erfarenhet av DevOps-principer och CI/CD-processer.
   

  

 Som person är du noggrann, systematisk och har en förmåga att arbeta med hög precision. Du är en lagspelare som värdesätter samarbete och vill bidra till dina egna, teamets och organisationens utveckling. Du har lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska samt kan obehindrat tillgodogöra dig information på engelska. Om du brinner för Data Warehousing och är redo att ta dig an nya utmaningar i en dynamisk miljö, tror vi att du kommer att trivas hos oss.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 I den här rekryteringen har vi valt att samarbeta med Ada Digital som strävar efter en transparent, inkluderande och snabbrörlig rekryteringsupplevelse. Vi vill veta mer om dig och din potential! Du söker tjänsten enkelt och behöver inte bifoga några dokument. Det räcker med en motivering till varför du söker tjänsten och om du saknar CV kan du bifoga din LinkedIn-profil. Följ sedan din ansökan live via vår hemsida. Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan bli tillsatt före sista ansökningsdatum. Är du nyfiken och vill veta mer innan du söker? Hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare. Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!

description:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.
Project Manager (m/f/d)- Tietoevry Industry
Are you passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technology and experienced in project management? Do you dream of being part of one of the largest and most dynamic tech companies in the Nordics? If so, we have the perfect role for you!
Data Platforms is on the lookout for a talented Project Manager to help us revolutionize how organizations manage liquidity, information exchange, and data within their specific industry ecosystems. We specialize in five key service areas: Industry Messaging, Billing & Invoice, Data Services, Debt Register, and Eye-share.
At Data Platforms, we boast a substantial and growing customer base across the Nordics and beyond, serving clients in over 50 countries worldwide. This is your chance to be part of a team that creates a digital advantage for millions every day. Are you ready to make a difference?  

  

Your Role:
Joining Tietoevry Industry as a Project Manager means you'll dive into impactful work alongside an experienced team. Here's what you'll be doing:* Collaborative Environment: Work closely with senior colleagues, sharing experiences and knowledge to drive success.
* Strategic Leadership: Develop project plans, lead day-to-day communication, and ensure seamless project delivery for our clients.
* Modern Technology: Engage with the latest technology to meet diverse customer needs, enhancing your skills and knowledge.
* Client-Focused Development: Implement projects tailored to client requirements.


While this role includes some travel, it is not extensive, allowing you to maintain a healthy work-life balance.  

  

Who We're Looking For:
We need a dedicated professional with a strong track record in successfully managing major delivery projects. The ideal candidate should be:* Customer-Centric: Service-oriented with a positive attitude, detail-oriented, and committed to quality.
* Communicative: Excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English.
* Experienced: Background in managing complex business operations.
* Lifelong Learner: Eager to learn new things and share knowledge, valuing continuous improvement.

  

What We Offer:
At Tietoevry, we believe in professional growth, meaningful projects, an open culture, and exceptional work-life balance. Here's what you can expect:* Growth Opportunities: Enhance your career with meaningful projects in a fast-developing sector.
* Flexible Hybrid Work Model: Enjoy a blend of remote and on-site work to suit your lifestyle.
* Cultural Fit: Thrive in an environment that values curiosity, learning, and professional development.


Join us in creating the future of the tech industry, where every day brings new possibilities, and innovation is a way of life.
Did we get you inspired?
We look forward to your application! Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we’ll reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact hiring manager Mats Sjöström, at mats.sjostrom@tietoevry.com, or Talent Acquisition Partner Rojin Amini, at rojin.amini@tietoevry.com.
Hope to hear from you soon!*We perform background checks on all final candidates.**Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.**Tietoevry thrives with diversity, and we welcome applicants of all genders, ages, abilities, ethnicities, orientations, beliefs, and backgrounds.*
About Tietoevry
Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.
Creating purposeful technology to reinvent the world for good
At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Engineering Manager - Sound
description:
**At Epidemic Sound, we make soundtracking content simple and inspiring with unlimited access to music and sound effects. Headquartered in Stockholm, with offices all over the world, we are a force of over 500 on a mission to soundtrack the world. Our innovative licensing model paves the way for creators - from YouTubers to small businesses to the world’s most recognizable brands such as Netflix, Redbull and BBC - to use sound to enhance their content while simultaneously supporting artists both financially and creatively. Epidemic Sound music is heard 2 billion times a day on YouTube alone and is recognized as one of Europe’s fastest-growing companies by the Financial Times. Epidemic Sound is backed by EQT, Blackstone, Creandum, Atwater Capital to name a few.**

  

We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager to lead one of our core services teams, focused on the music area. This is a critical role where you will oversee personnel, delivery, processes, and cross-team technical collaboration. You’ll be working with one of our core domains - managing the systems that ingest, manage, and distribute the music provided by our artists.


The team contributes value through track taxonomy development, building efficient administrative tools, integrating with sound providers (such as Spotify), and developing platform functionality for other teams to access our extensive sounds library. Currently, the team is enhancing its metadata model to prepare our music catalog for exciting future applications.


In this role, you’ll have a significant influence on how the team operates, defining the technical roadmap and target architecture. You will be managing a diverse and dynamic team and your leadership will be key in fostering a high level of psychological safety and cultivating team members across all levels of seniority.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* Lead and support the team in development processes and practices such as attending standups, mob programming, and facilitating design sessions.
* Conduct 1:1s to guide team members’ growth, improving their skills, team dynamics, and career progression.
* Collaborate closely with the Product Manager and stakeholders to ensure sustainable, high-quality software delivery at a fast pace.
* Own the engineering plan concerning security, legacy, capacity, and quality.
* Manage cross-team technical deliveries and communication.

 **Who You Are:**

* An experienced leader capable of coaching and growing a team of engineers, from junior to senior levels.
* A strategic thinker who can create a vision for the team and turn it into reality.
* Someone who thrives on collaboration, working closely with the Product Manager and other stakeholders to ensure company-wide alignment.
* A decision-maker who can lead through coaching but knows when to step in to make key decisions.
  

**Must-Have Qualifications:**

* Strong technical background with expertise in modern agile software development practices and cloud technology.
* Proven experience managing and growing engineering teams.
* Solid understanding of system design, architecture, and team dynamics.
* Ability to build a psychologically safe work environment for your team.
  

**Nice-to-Have Qualifications:**

* Experience in the music industry and/or sound production.
* Familiarity with Kotlin/Python, GCP, BigQuery and experience working in a modern, product-driven company.
  


Join us and be part of a central team, where your work will directly impact the core of Epidemic Sound's business and shape the future of sound production and management!

 **Equal Opportunity Employer:**  

We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.  



**Application**  

Do you want to be a part of our fantastic team? Please apply, in English, by clicking the link below.

title: Systems Engineer - Database Management Services
description:
**Job ID:** 258536


**Date posted:** 17/09/2024


**About this work area**  

  

Here at IKEA, we are looking to hire passionate engineers, excited about technology and innovative ways of working to shape the future of IKEA. In Database Management Services you will be part of a team that operates globally to keep the lights on for the whole value-chain of applications and services. Automation, monitoring, and solution discovery is at our heart to continuously modernize the consumption of database products and services.  

  

The Engineer we are looking for has a can-do and engaged attitude! Through your growth mindset, we hope you are hungry for technology and never stop learning. You have an immense passion for simplicity and find smarter ways to contribute to our business! Our belief is shared with you around the importance of solving problems and being consumer centric, but also working towards outcomes rather than outputs.  

  

**What you need to know**  

  

To be successful you have:  

* 5-8 years documented database administration experience in Oracle, and at least one of Postgres and SQL Server db engines. Knowledge designing, maintaining, and supporting Database infrastructure is meriting.
* Hand on experience Linux/Redhat OS
* In-depth knowledge of Ansible automation, including playbook development, roles, and Ansible Tower.
* Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash) for customizing and extending Ansible functionality in the context of databases.
* Experience of monitoring and event management like Observability, Otel Framework and event driven architecture.

  

Other merits considered:  

* SRE practitioner and ambassador of implementing automation first and event driven mindset
* Hands-on experience in performance monitoring and tuning at instance level, database level, OS level and Query level
* Hands-on experience on Golden gate to setup bi-directional and Uni-directional replications, Replication at table and Schema level
* Good Knowledge of Oracle Enterprise Manager
* Experience performing and optimizing database migration methodologies for Oracle to Oracle, Oracle to Postgres and platform migrations
* GCP/Azure/ Alibaba Cloud provider experience is meriting
* Apply structured engineering approach adhering to processes like ITIL

  

Tasks you could be engaged in:  

* You will be trusted to combine systems knowledge, monitoring expertise, and operations competence with programming/scripting skills to build new capabilities, enhance and automate our services and environments.
* Participate in design, development and delivery of automation and self-service capabilities for efficiency, availability, and usability.
* Continuously monitor and improve our environments using tools like OEM, Prometheus, Grafana
* By following latest technology trends and standards, developing and running our current and future monitoring solutions supporting Products and Services using automation first approach and the right toolsets required in order to deliver according to requirements.
* Ensure that Services are built according to best practices by continuously learning from and benchmarking against industry standards to continuously validate and improve deliverables.
* Through operational engagement ensure database management runs smoothly 24/7
* Be part of/lead troubleshooting sessions with other infrastructure teams to resolve critical incidents.
* Support to maintain the service quality, life cycle management and operation of environments to fulfil the service commitments.
* Be prepared to dig deep into our technology stack and have a lot of fun on the way

  

About you:
  

* We hope you aim to be tech-agnostic. You should feel comfortable working with a variety of technologies.
* You have a technical background and preferably deep knowledge from working specifically with development and automation. You know what good looks like having strong analytical and problemsolving skills to see the high-level picture as well as enjoying working with the details. You have a mature approach to handle changing priorities and communicating complex topics in a pedagogic data driven way.
* We hope that you value attitude and mindset and lead by example. You take joy in showing empathy and openness towards others, also seeing trust and respect as the basis for building strong relationships. You understand the power of communicating clearly and effectively to achieve intended outcomes. You are a team player and happy to share your knowledge and help everyone around you to grow as individual engineers and strong engineering teams.
* It’s in your nature to challenge existing ways of doing things speaking your mind, therefore taking the initiative and try new ideas without fear of failure. You use your mistakes as opportunities for development and improvement but never lose focus on what ads value, finding solutions that meet consumer’s needs.

  

About us:
  

We’re a small team consisting of around 6 people running a broad scope. We are based in southern Sweden in two locations and apply a hybrid work policy. Consumer centricity is our top priority.  

  

We have a large footprint in IKEA managing thousands of databases, in our daily work we interface many stakeholders. As modernization steams ahead, we are expected to be at the forefront of keeping pace with new technologies. With this we can offer you an exciting arena where you will have the possibility to grow as an engineer but also as a person.  

  

**About this work area**  

  

Group Digital set the digital agenda to keep IKEA leading in an uncertain and fast-moving environment. We drive the development, provision and operation of our digital products and services using new and existing technology and agile delivery methods to deliver at pace. At the same time, we provide a home for digital skills to both develop and extend the technical, people and business skills needed to ensure continuous development and growth of our digital capability.  

  

The IKEA culture and values are very much a part of our business and day-to-day work life. For you to thrive and grow with IKEA it’s important for us that you share our values! You can read more regarding our values and life at IKEA on our website www.ikea.com.  

  

We believe a healthy and flexible life balance is important, so together we will strive to create a work environment where you feel in control of your life balance, can be yourself, grow and excel in both your personal and professional life. At IKEA, we welcome all dimensions of diversity. A diverse and inclusive workplace is good for our co-workers, for our customers and for our business. Working with differences helps us grow both as individuals and as an organization. ... Simply put: we believe the uniqueness of every individual makes IKEA better!  

  

**Questions and support? Let's connect!**  

  

Please note, we only handle applications in English and no applications coming in by email. You might have some questions about the recruitment process, and we are more than happy to answer those! Feel free to connect with the recruitment specialist, david.smith6@ingka.com
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Receptionist Scandic Europa
description:
Scandic Europa ligger exakt 97 steg från Göteborg centralstation, vägg i vägg med stadens populära shoppingstråk – Nordstan. Hotellet är ett av Scandics största med hela 456 rum som garanterar att det alltid är något som händer i huset. Dessutom har hotellet en utpräglad musikprofil vilket bidrar till att göra miljön levande, liksom vår restaurang HAK. Hotellets storlek medför också goda utvecklingsmöjligheter för medarbetare som vill prova på nya avdelningar och roller. Vi är ett stort gäng med snabba steg och goda hjärtan, vi ser efter varandra och gör vårt yttersta för att alla ska trivas på vår spännande och sociala arbetsplats. Genom precis detta arbetssätt skapar vi fantastiska hotellupplevelser till våra gäster.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Europa.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en anställning för enstaka dagar på extra vid behov.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Head of SAP CX Sales
description:
**Job Opportunity: Head of SAP CX Sales**


Are you ready to pioneer the transformation of sales channels in the Nordic region? Langia IT Solutions, a dynamic leader in the technology sector, is seeking a visionary Head of Sales to spearhead our journey towards becoming the foremost SAP Customer Experience (CX) partner in the Nordics.

 **About Us:**


Langia IT Solutions is at the forefront of revolutionizing customer experience and business processes through cutting-edge technology solutions. Specializing in SAP products, we are dedicated to empowering businesses to connect customer data, deliver personalized content, and craft seamless customer journeys. Langia has already taken a strong position in delivering Digital Commerce solutions based on SAP Commerce Cloud and is now gearing up to extend our service offering further and progress in the value chain to provide solutions that enable our clients to evolve into true, digital intelligent enterprises.

 **Why Join Us?**

* **Innovative Environment:**  

At Langia, innovation is our lifeblood. As a member of our team, you'll be immersed in a culture that fosters creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement.
* **Impactful Work:**  

Lead the charge in shaping the future of sales channels across the Nordic region. Your efforts will directly contribute to transforming how businesses engage with their customers and drive revenue growth.
* **Professional Growth:**  

We invest in our employees' development and provide multiple opportunities for learning and advancement. As Head of SAP CX Sales, you'll have the autonomy to shape your role, build a team and expand your skill set.
* **Collaborative Culture:**  

Join a diverse team of talented individuals, many whom have a long history with SAP and former Hybris, are passionate about leveraging technology and driving meaningful change. Collaboration, respect, and teamwork are at the heart of everything we do.
* **Contribute to Company Growth:**  

You will join Langia at an exciting time where we are preparing not only for organic growth but where we are also looking into mergers and acquisitions within the SAP sphere and elsewhere to expand accelerate our growth trajectory. The environment creates ample opportunities to develop your own career and build up the organization.

  

**Your Role:**


As the Head of SAP CX Sales, you will be responsible for leading our sales efforts and driving business growth in the Nordic region. Your primary focus will be on establishing Langia as the go-to SAP CX partner, building strategic relationships with clients, and delivering tailored solution offerings that address their unique needs. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and execute sales strategies, identify new business opportunities, and ensure the successful implementation of SAP CX solutions.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement comprehensive sales strategies to meet or exceed the sales targets for SAP Customer Experience products.
* Lead, motivate, and manage the sales team to achieve top performance and sales objectives.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and stakeholders.
* Work closely with the marketing and product teams to ensure alignment on product positioning, key benefits, and target customers.
* Analyze market trends and competitor activities to adapt strategies and enhance the company’s competitive position.
* Provide detailed sales forecasting and manage the sales pipeline efficiently.
* Negotiate large-scale contracts and partnerships.

Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and professional associations to enhance brand visibility and network expansion.  
* 

**Requirements:**

* Proven track record of success in sales leadership roles, within the technology or consulting industry.
* Extensive experience with SAP Customer Experience (CX) solutions, including SAP Commerce Cloud, Emarsys, SAP Customer Data Cloud (CDC), SAP Customer Data Platform (CDP) and/or SAP Cloud for Customer (C4C).
* Strong business acumen and understanding of sales processes, customer journey mapping, and digital transformation initiatives.
* Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence key stakeholders at all levels.
* Strategic thinker with the ability to translate client requirements into innovative solutions that drive business outcomes.
* Fluent in English and at least one Nordic language
* Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or a related field. A Master’s degree is preferred.

 **Benefits:**

* Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
* Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance.
* Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
* Flexible working conditions and the possibility to work remotely.
* Inclusive and supportive company culture.

  

**Join Us in Shaping the Future:**


If you're ready to take on a leadership role in a dynamic and fast-growing organization, we want to hear from you! Join us on our mission to redefine customer experience and unlock new possibilities for businesses across the Nordic region. Apply now and be a part of our journey towards building the modern, digital intelligent enterprise.

title: Infrastructure Azure Administrator
description:
**Would you like to join a leading Digital Solution Company and contribute to innovative solutions that are built on a daily basis?**


Our client is a leading global provider of IT solutions and services, known for their customer-centric approach to digital transformation. With a rich history dating back to 1996, they have continually evolved to meet the changing needs of their customers. Their services encompass consulting, technology, and outsourcing, delivering innovative solutions to complex challenges. They have also been honored multiple times as a top employer, including being named a Great Place To Work from 2015 to 2023.

  

You will work on a long-term project for one of the largest financial institutions in Northern Europe, known for its strong commitment to digital innovation and providing a wide range of financial services to both private and corporate clients.

**Role and responsibilities:**

* Design, build, and maintain infrastructure for generative AIuse cases on Microsoft Azure
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integrationиof infrastructure components
* Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaaC) best practices using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or Azure Resource Manager templates
* Manage and monitor network protocols, keys, encryption/decryption for secure data transmission
* Develop monitoring and alerting mechanisms to ensure the smooth functioning of the infrastructure
* Write scripts in Bash, Python, and Shell to automate repetitive tasks improve efficiency
* Design, implement, and manage containerized environments using Docker and Kubernetes for scalable and efficient deployment of AI applications
* Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies related to generative AI, Azure cloud computing, Docker, and Kubernetes
* Provide technical guidance and support to team members

**What we expect:**

  

* 5+ years of experience as an Infrastructure Administrator with a focus on IaaC
* Proficient in Docker, and Kubernetes
* Strong knowledge of Microsoft Azure platform
* Strong understanding of container networking, storage, and security
* Proficiency in scripting languages like Bash, Python, and Shell
* Experience with networking protocols, encryption/decryption techniques, and secure data transmission
* Familiarity with monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK Stack
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team
* Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms
* Experience with streaming systems MQ, Kafka , Azure Event Hubs
* Nice to have: Microsoft certified: Azure Administrator
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

**What we offer:**

* B2B contract or employment agreement
* Work-life balance
* Support in learning and development further while also providing multi-year career opportunities
* Stable work in a supportive team

title: Business Analyst for the Automotive sector
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**Business & Technology Solutions** **(BTS) is a growing practice in Sweden with the aspiration to be the key trusted advisor accompanying our clients on their transformation journey to a more successful, sustainable, and innovative future, bringing in-depth business and technology as well as transformation expertise. By joining BTS, you will have the opportunity to help shape the set-up, form the culture, and together decide on what is important to focus on initially and long term to create a dynamic, fun, and rewarding workplace.**  

  

**We are looking for experienced** **Business Analysts** **to join our** **Automotive** **team, where you work with some of the leading and most well-known brands within this industry driving their digitalization journey. As a Business Analyst you play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and digital. To support our customers in their digital transformation, Capgemini is looking for consultants with passion for business and technology serving the Automotive sector.**  

  

**The responsibilities will vary between initiatives, you will:**  

* **Bring experience from working in early stages to prepare and initiate implementation of business opportunities**
* **Identify opportunities with existing and new customers, support with your industry know-how and assessment of market trends in the preparation and execution**
* **Act as the bridge between business and IT**
* **Contribute with domain experience within industrial, commercial (marketing, aftermarket, retail) and finance**
* **Be responsible for understanding business requirements and customer needs and translating these to user-stories**
* **Be part of an Agile Delivery team and act as an extension of Product Owner**
**What you'll bring:**  

* **Experience working in the automotive domain**
* **Experience in Requirements elicitation and analysis**
* **Experience with Process Modelling**
* **Data Capture and data analytics**
* **Detailed understanding of Systems Lifecycles and design**
* **Process and platform experience in one or more of the following – Supply Chain Management, Sourcing and Procurement, Sales & Distribution, Manufacturing processes, Connected Services and ecommerce**
* **Experience of implementing larger transformation programs**
* **Experience with SAP, Microsoft and Salesforce is a plus**
**Soft skills and background:**  

* **You are characterized by your experience/interest in business development and sales, your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation.**
* **You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of Swedish both spoken and written.**
* **You are fine with independent work but have experience of and thinks collaboration and teamwork is the ground for a good result.**
* **Bachelor's degree in business, management, or a related field.**

  

**Apply now! For more information, please mail to bts\_se\_recruitment@capgemini.com.****Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Transformation Manager for the automotive sector
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**Business & Technology Solutions (BTS)** **is a growing practice in Sweden with the aspiration to be the key trusted advisor accompanying our clients on their transformation journey to a more successful, sustainable, and innovative future, bringing in-depth business and technology as well as transformation expertise. By joining BTS, you will have the opportunity to help shape the set-up, form the culture, and together decide on what is important to focus on initially and long term to create a dynamic, fun, and rewarding workplace.**  

  

**We are looking for** **Transformation Manager** **to join our** **Automotive** **team, where you work with some of the leading and most well-known brands within this industry driving their digitalization journey. As a Transformation Manager you play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and digital. Confident at working in a technology-driven environment (but not necessarily from a digital background or an expert in digital tools), you will bring proven skills and experience in leading and delivering consultancy projects or workstreams to design and implement new digital applications, platforms, and experiences.**  

  

**A Transformation Manager is responsible for leading, advising and managing process changes using digital capabilities to improve operational efficiency, drive growth, and enhance overall business performance. This role requires a strong understanding of business processes, data analysis, and project management skills.**  

  

**Key responsibilities include:**  

* **Developing and executing large-scale business and digital transformation strategies to meet the organization's goals and objectives by collaborating with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliverables.**
* **Identifying areas for improvement and recommending changes to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of business operations.**
* **Build strong relationship and communicating effectively with stakeholders to keep them informed of transformation progress, risks, and issues and understand their needs and priorities.**
* **Staying up to date with industry trends and best practices to ensure the organization remains competitive.**
**What you'll bring:**  

* **Several years of experience in large-scale digital transformation or a related field in the automotive domain.**
* **Experience in advising management teams in navigating future direction of their business.**
* **Understanding of Systems Lifecycles and design.**
* **Process and platform experience in one or more of the following – Supply Chain Management, Sourcing and Procurement, Sales & Distribution, Manufacturing processes, Connected Services and ecommerce.**
* **Experience with SAP, Microsoft and Salesforce is a plus.**

  

**Soft skills and background:**  

* **You are characterized by your experience/interest in business development and sales, your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation.**
* **You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of** **Swedish** **both spoken and written.**
* **You are fine with independent work but have experience of and thinks collaboration and teamwork is the ground for a good result.**
* **Bachelor's degree in business, management, or a related field.**

  

**Apply now! For more information about the team, role or others, please mail to bts\_se\_recruitment@capgemini.com****Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**
