title: Senior Cloud Architect
description:
- We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Join us and collaborate with top minds, build groundbreaking solutions, and make a real difference for our clients. Enjoy extensive professional development, global reach, and a supportive, Google-inspired culture. If you're passionate about the cloud, this is where you want to be.


With over 13 years of experience in Google Cloud under our belt, offices in 18 countries and more than 600 experts, we have deployed practical innovation alongside Google. We focus on infrastructure modernisation, data management, smart analytics, application modernisation, and AI & machine learning.


Curious about our projects? We got you: Check out our success stories

  
**Day-to-day life**

* Implement specific GCP-solutions for our clients, build and expand infrastructures, write infrastructure-as-code and execute seamless migrations from on-prem setups
* Work with team members and Google experts to guide customers to new solutions
* Contribute to pre-sales and help train teammates and solve complex problems
* Work with the latest developments in Google Cloud Platform, Kubernetes and Terraform and continue to develop your expertise
* Manage presentations and direct communication with clients, bridging the gap between customers and technical solutions

Want to know more? Check out our people stories on Youtube


  
You're passionate about the cloud and love to learn and explore its ever-evolving possibilities. As a senior team member, you're a self-starter who can manage your workload and drive projects forward, while enjoying the collaborative energy of our team. You're client-focused, able to understand their needs, translate them into technical solutions, and deliver presentations that resonate with your audience.
  

  

You're comfortable designing and building GCP architectures, understanding networking, security and containerisation concepts, and working with Infrastructure as Code. You will be able to read and debug code in at least one of the following languages: Python, Golang, Java or HCL. You can manage customer interactions and work effectively with diverse team members. Bonus points if you have experience of migrating from on-premises environments and alternative cloud providers to GCP. Fluency in English is required.


  
- Why Choose Devoteam G Cloud?



	* Innovative Impact: Work on the forefront of cloud technology at a globally recognized leader in Google Cloud solutions.
	* Direct Google Connection: Collaborate closely with Google teams, shaping the future of cloud and AI.
	* Unleash Your Expertise: Thrive in a fast-paced environment where sharing knowledge and success is paramount.
	* End-to-End Impact: Drive complete business transformations, from strategy to implementation and beyond.
	* Accelerate Your Career: Grow within a Google-inspired culture, gaining specialisations and certifications.*"Partnering with Devoteam has been a highlight of our efforts at Google Cloud. Their dedication and expertise elevate every project we undertake together. It's truly a collaboration that delivers exceptional results." — Alexander Percivall, Senior Partner Engineer, Google Cloud Nordics, Stockholm, Sweden.*

We do plenty of activities, like meet-ups, hackathons, and partnerships. Don’t lose any of them: follow us on LinkedIn
  

  

**Benefits**


	* Encouragement and support for training and certification, in the form of coaching from other team members, cost coverage, and financial incentives.
	* Challenging and rewarding assignments, many of which are end-to-end.
	* A hybrid work model as standard, with flexible working hours and location to support your work-life balance.
	* An international, diverse, and inclusive team.
	* A human-centric and value-based company culture.
	* Wellness grants for sports activities (5,000 SEK/year).
	* A modern office in central Stockholm.
	* Full provision of work tools.
	* A variety of social events.Our culture is based on continuous learning and career development, supported by a genuine, inclusive, and expert team that really loves pizza.
  

  

Want to know more about life at Devoteam? Check out our Instagram page .
  

  

Ready to join an elite team? Apply for our Senior Cloud Engineer position and become part of something exceptional!
  

  

Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! Check out our Career page
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Junior Data Engineer
description:
Vårt ”Data & Analytics”-team söker en nyfiken och engagerad Data Engineer.
   

  

 På Aller Media har vi tagit stora steg i resan mot att bli mer insiktsdrivna. Vi har de senaste åren byggt upp en dataplattform som samlar in och transformerar data från vår print- och digitala affär. Vi har i dagsläget lösningar för personaliserat innehåll, vår egen ”co-author” och en gedigen infrastruktur för vår dataplattform.
   

  

 Som Junior Data Engineer kommer du att ha stora möjligheter att vara involverad och påverka vår framtid. Framför allt kommer du att vara en viktig del i utvecklingen av varumärken som ELLE, Hänt, MåBra och Allas.
   

  

 Ditt team och din arbetsplats
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i ”Data & Analytics"-teamet, där du kommer att ha seniora kollegor runt dig och där du kommer ha möjlighet att lära dig mycket beroende på i vilken riktning du vill utvecklas. Du får ett stort mandat samtidigt som du får det stöd du behöver för att känna dig bekväm i arbetet och organisationen.
   

  

 Det dagliga arbetet sker främst i tvärfunktionella och i stor utsträckning självstyrande arbetsteam med våra slutkunder (användarna) i fokus. Teamet består av Data Engineers, Data Scientists och analytiker.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som Junior Data Engineer kommer du att vara en central del i vårt arbete för att möjliggöra ett insiktsdrivet arbetssätt. Du kommer säkert att komma i kontakt med flera av de andra rollernas ansvarsområden, och med större fokus på bredd snarare än djup, samt med stora kontaktytor runt organisationen.
   

  

 Huvudfokus i arbetet är att samla in och transformera data från olika källor, men du kommer även arbeta med att visualisera den för slutanvändare. Du kommer även att samla in affärsbehov och genomföra analyser som stödjer verksamheten i olika delar av organisationen.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta med teknologierna:
   

  

* Google Cloud Platform (Big Query)
* SQL
* Python
* Power BI
* Looker Studio


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Vi tror att du är en person med mycket goda analytiska färdigheter som brinner för att strukturera och analysera data samt visualisera insikter för att driva verksamheten framåt. Vidare tror vi att du är flexibel när det gäller exakt vilka uppgifter du ägnar dig åt under en given dag eller vecka. Vi tror att du troligtvis har ett intresse för Data Engineering, visualisering och analys och gärna vill sammanfoga detta och lära dig mer.
   

  

 Vi tror att du har arbetat ett par år och fortfarande är väldigt nyfiken på flera områden inom Data & Analytics.
   

  

 Några egenskaper vi tror att du har…
   

  

* Starkt intresse för data engineering, visualisering och analys
* God kommunikativ förmåga (både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift)
* God förmåga att samla in, strukturera och transformera data
* God förmåga att genomföra analyser och visualisera insikter
* Passionerad för att ständigt lära dig nya saker, prova nya sätt och lära känna nya teknologier
* Bekväm med att arbeta i agila team i en mycket rörlig miljö
* En "doer" som inte har något emot att kavla upp ärmarna


 För framtiden är du troligtvis någon som vill lära dig mer om och utvecklas inom Data Engineering, visualisering eller analys.
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder
   

  

 Vi har nyligen övergått till en gemensam nordisk organisationsstruktur och våra samarbeten inom Aller Media Nordic öppnar upp för värdefulla internationella erfarenheter.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i ett företag i ständig utveckling där två dagar aldrig är den andra lik. Det är en kreativ miljö där allt är möjligt. Här har vi en nyfiken tillsammanskultur där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål och stöttar varandra.
   

  

 Hos oss får du arbeta mot en tydlig vision – att göra svenska kvinnors liv rikare. Aller Media i Sverige har nått all-time high resultat de senaste åren i en utmanande marknad med en vinst på över 100 miljoner SEK förra året.
   

  

 Ansök!
   

  

 Tjänsten är en heltidstjänst där vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning. Vårt nyrenoverade kontor ligger i Stockholm på Humlegårdsgatan 6.
   

  

 Vi utvärderar kandidater löpande, så ansök så snart som möjligt och senast den 7 oktober.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten eller företaget? Kontakta:
   

  

* Emelie Ekman, Head of Data & Analytics på emelie.ekman@aller.com.
* HR-kontakt Frida Hamark, People Partner på frida.hamark@aller.com


 Vi ser fram emot att få din ansökan!

title: Platform Solutions Specialist 💻
description:
**This is Mevisio**
*Mevisio is a fast-growing SaaS company offering a low-code platform that digitizes management and collaboration in the manufacturing industry.*
 We provide a digital alternative to the physical whiteboards traditionally used for daily team meetings on the shop floor, with applications extending to general operations management and other Lean Manufacturing practices. The Mevisio Platform is a tool for leaders and team members to help them work smarter and more efficiently with the help of visualization and improved communication. Mevisio is highly customizable to the specific requirements of each client, including layout of boards and integrations with other systems, that allows the platform to solve the different needs of each company.
   

  

 Our main clientele comprises large enterprise industries, globally operating companies, and we've expanded our user base to over 50 countries in just a couple of years and there is much more to come!
   

  

*⚡️ We are revolutionizing the way manufacturing industries operate. Sounds cool, right?*
**Why Mevisio?**
 Walking into the office of Mevisio you will meet passionate, collaborative and kind people, and a fast-growing SaaS company. We are about to visualize the manufacturing industry and redefine its future, to succeed - we need more awesome people like YOU in our team!
   

  

 We work hard to create a workplace where we feel motivated and engaged and we have a fantastic platform and market to conquer - let’s do that together! 🎆
   

  

**What will you do?**
 As our Platform Solutions Specialist in the Solutions team, you'll have the chance to work closely with the manufacturing world, helping our customers to build and implement enterprise applications to be used on sites all over the world. You will be the technical expert of customization and play an important role to help managers and their teams to reach operational excellence.
   

  

**Your Tasks**
 🔸Configuring our platform to our customers needs, using low-code development tools
   

  

 🔸 Integrate the platform with other systems
   

  

 🔸 Be involved in the implementation project together with the customer
   

  

 🔸 Attend customer workshops at the manufacturing sites, mostly in northern Europe and sometimes in the U.S.
   

  

 🔸 Second or 3rd line support to our customers
   

  

 🔸 Write technical documentation in our platform
   

  

**What we think you will bring to us!**
 🔸 Bachelor’s degree in engineering (programs based on the science of computer, information, physics, mechanical or industrial engineering and management are suitable)
   

  

 🔸 Or consulting experience within IT, industrial automation or operational excellence
   

  

 🔸 Familiar with setting up integrations between systems
   

  

 🔸 Basic experience in JavaScript and database development
   

  

 🔸 Practical experience of working in or close to manufacturing
   

  

 Fluent in English on a professional level, German too is a plus
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 A colleague with a team-oriented approach, a service mindset and an excitement to create results through tech. We hope that you are curious about new skills or happy to share! Since we are a growing company, it's important that we share ambition and help each other feel well and engaged. We are in this together - and so excited to share this adventure with whoever you are! 🫶
   

  

**Other Perks And Benefits**
 🚆 Near public transit
   

  

 🏖️ 6 weeks of vacation
   

  

 📈 Pension contribution
   

  

 🪐 Development opportunities
   

  

 🔕 Flexible working hours
   

  

 👨‍👩‍👧 Work-life balance
   

  

 👟 Gym around the corner
   

  

 🎊 Social gatherings
   

  

 🏢 Central Office
   

  

 🧑🏾‍💻 New tech gear
   

  

 ☕️ Free Coffee/Tee and breakfast every day
   

  

**Sounds interesting?! You know what to do then!** 
 👇🏻
   

  

 Every year, Deloitte ranks Sweden's fifty fastest growing technology companies, in their Sweden Technology Fast 50 list. With a revenue growth of 914% over the last four years, 2018-2021, Mevisio made it to number 34 on the list. Adding to the achievement, the growth has been made with no external funding.
   

  

 – We are glad to see that our hard work has payed off. We are a small, dedicated team that is committed to providing an enterprise grade platform to our customers with the best user experience there is. Our customers have tough requirements when it comes to service delivery and information security—every new customer is an achievement. I'm really proud of the team that has made this possible, says Marcus Wejderot, CEO of Mevisio.

title: Chief Product & Technology Officer (CPTO)
description:
**Company Overview** 




 At Vionlabs, we are at the forefront of revolutionizing the media and entertainment industry with cutting-edge AI solutions that enhance content discovery, viewer engagement, and operational efficiency. As we evolve, our focus is to further develop these AI technologies and transform our business into a scalable SaaS model, driving new value for our customers and fueling the next wave of innovation. We are seeking a senior leader to join our executive team as Chief Product & Technology Officer (CPTO), guiding both product and technology strategies to accelerate this transformation.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As the CPTO, you will lead the development and scaling of Vionlabs’ AI-driven solutions while driving the transition towards a SaaS business model. Your role will be to shape the company’s product roadmap and drive technology innovation, ensuring that our solutions address complex challenges in the media and entertainment industry. This is a unique opportunity to lead product development and tech transformation in a rapidly growing company, creating a lasting impact.
 



 We are looking for someone with extensive experience in AI technology and SaaS business models, ideally with a background in the media and entertainment sector.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Strategic Leadership:** 
 Define and execute the technology and product roadmap to further advance our AI solutions and transition the company to a scalable SaaS business model.
* **Product Development:** 
 Oversee the full product lifecycle, from ideation to launch, ensuring that our AI solutions are market-fit and customer-centric.
* **Technology Innovation:** 
 Lead the development of scalable, robust AI technologies that solve complex media and entertainment industry challenges.
* **SaaS Transformation:** 
 Spearhead the transformation of our AI solutions into a SaaS model, driving sustainable growth and recurring revenue streams.
* **Team Building:** 
 Continue to build a world-class technology team that drives AI innovation and scalability. Simultaneously, establish a product organization from scratch, laying the foundation for sustainable product development and growth.
* **Customer Collaboration:** 
 Engage with clients and partners to understand their evolving needs and ensure that our product offerings continue to meet and exceed expectations.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* **Proven Leadership:** 
 10+ years of senior leadership experience in product and technology roles, with a focus on scaling AI-driven solutions and transitioning to a SaaS business model.
* **AI Expertise:** 
 Deep understanding of AI technologies and latest research trends, including deep learning, data science, and their application within SaaS platforms.
* **Media & Entertainment Industry Experience:** 
 Experience working in or with media and entertainment companies like Netflix, Paramount, or similar, is highly preferred.
* **SaaS Strategy:** 
 Demonstrated experience in shaping product and technology strategy for SaaS-based businesses, with a track record of success in SaaS transformations.
* **Technical Knowledge:** 
 In-depth understanding of the architecture required for building scalable SaaS platforms powered by AI technologies.
* **Team Leadership:** 
 Proven experience in building high-performing tech teams and establishing product organizations from the ground up in fast-paced environments.



  





**What We Offer:** 



* Opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered media solutions in a rapidly growing company.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment, where your ideas and expertise will make a significant impact.
* Competitive salary and equity package.
* Flexible working conditions with the ability to work remotely from anywhere in Europe or in a hybrid setup.

title: Information Security Engineer
description:
At Billogram, we aim to be the good guys of billing. We profit when our clients' customers are happy and make timely payments, rather than benefiting from missed payments and the subsequent debt collection. We believe that treating people well is a sound business strategy. That's why our invoicing and payments platform is engineered to eliminate friction and add value for both our clients and their customers, thereby enhancing their relationship.
   

  

 To sustain our growth and become a leader in the European consumer billing market, we are looking for an experienced Information Security Engineer to join our team.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 As an Information Security Engineer at Billogram, you will be a key player in advancing our Information Security initiatives. With the increasing demands of regulatory compliance and enterprise customer expectations, your role will be critical in addressing security-related issues. You will have hands-on involvement in code-based and infrastructure-related security tasks, ensuring our platform meets and exceeds industry standards. We are looking for someone with 5+ years of experience in cybersecurity, with a proven track record in securing complex digital environments.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Security Incident Response: Actively address and resolve open CVEs, findings during incidents, and results from penetration tests and disaster recovery plan (DRP) drills.
* Hands-on Security Work: Engage directly in security-related tasks, whether they involve coding or infrastructure. You might not always complete every issue alone, but you will initiate work and drive progress substantially.
* Collaboration: Work closely with development, IT, and other teams to integrate security best practices across the organization.
* Continuous Improvement: Contribute to refining our processes, ensuring security is embedded in every aspect of our operations.


**What We Are Looking For:**
 To thrive in this role, you need to be proactive, self-driven, and comfortable taking the initiative. You should be adept at navigating complex situations, arranging and moderating meetings, and communicating clearly with diverse stakeholders. Your ability to stay focused on finding practical solutions to security challenges will be essential.
   

  

**Key Qualifications & Skills:**
**Essential:**
* Strong coding experience
* Experience with cloud hosting environments
* Experience with container-based infrastructure
* Solid understanding of security topics
* Fluency in English


**Nice-to-Haves:**
* Experience with AWS
* Experience with Kubernetes
* Experience with Python


**What We Offer:**
 Billogram provides a digital billing and payments platform, revolutionizing a forgotten part of the payments industry: the recurring invoice. Using smart technology, we help companies automate the whole payments process, leading to lower costs, increased profitability, and higher customer satisfaction. We want both sender and recipient to have the best experience possible. But since their interests don’t always align, it’s up to us to come up with smart solutions to satisfy both parties.
   

  

 At Billogram, we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. You will have the freedom and opportunity to develop alongside great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges, and a whole lot of laughs.
   

  

 We provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
   

  

**Welcome to the world of Billogram!**

title: Senior IT Support Analyst
description:
**At Universum, we help ambitious employers attract the right talent through unparalleled insights, expertise, and data-led actions.** 




  





 In the
 **Senior IT Support Analyst** 
 role with Universum, you’ll leverage your technical and customer-facing skills to support our internal customers' IT infrastructure requirements.
 



  





 You will be involved in the setup and maintenance of company-wide IT infrastructure solutions. This is a fantastic opportunity with a wide range of experience to join one of the leading companies in employer branding.
 



  





 The role is based in Stockholm, Sweden, and will report to the Head of Technology.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Provide support to internal customers via email and phone, primarily in Stockholm, with occasional support for other European offices.
* Manage equipment and software requirements for the Swedish office.
* Maintain and optimize the Office IT infrastructure, including systems management tools, Office365, and the physical office environment.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* 5+ years of experience as Senior IT support analyst/engineer or Helpdesk lead, with a focus on infrastructure and user support in a mixed Windows and Mac environment.
* Proficiency in Cisco / Meraki switch configurations.
* Knowledge of Active Directory, Office 365 and security end point protection
* Experience with Windows Server, VMware, and backup strategies.
* Familiarity with Audio/Visual systems.
* Experience with Mobile Device Management solutions such as Intune and Jamf.
* Understanding of ITIL processes.
* Some knowledge of Cloud technologies like Azure and AWS of advantage



  





**Skills and Attributes:** 



* Team player with strong problem-solving abilities.
* Flexible, proactive, and hands-on approach.
* Ability to handle occasionally demanding work environments.
* Native Swedish speaker with a high level of Business English proficiency.
* Well-organized with excellent time management skills.
* Ability to learn quickly in a dynamic environment and prioritize issues effectively.



  





**What we offer:** 




  




* Competitive salary
* 30 days’ vacation, 2 wellness days, 2 volunteer days
* Competitive pension solution
* Wellness grant of 3000 SEK annually
* Central office location
* Flexible working hours and hybrid work culture (3 days onsite, 2 days working elsewhere)
* A vibrant international culture with global reach



  





**“We radically include” is one of our seven values. We always strive to be intentionally inclusive and embrace differences. Therefore, we encourage people with different backgrounds, identities, and ethnicities to apply.**

title: Solutions Architect
description:
We are seeking a Solution Architect with deep experience in booking solutions for the travel industry. This is a competitive tender for an existing consultant, and the opportunity may close before the deadline for responses.
 



  





 As a Solution Architect, your focus will be on developing a future booking platform for external channels and harmonizing information flows between operators and distribution channels. You will collaborate closely with product owners, backend developers, and business representatives to ensure seamless data exchange across systems.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop a future-focused booking platform for external travel channels.
* Harmonize information flows between operators and distribution networks.
* Work closely with stakeholders to align technical solutions with business objectives.
* Lead architectural decisions regarding system integrations and REST API design.


- 


**Key Skills and Competencies:** 



* Extensive experience as a Solution Architect in the travel industry.
* Strong background in online travel sales and traffic information systems.
* Expertise in designing and managing REST APIs.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex architecture to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience with Agile methodologies (SAFe framework).
* Familiarity with information modeling.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Swedish language skills (highly advantageous).
* Knowledge of OSDM (Open Sales and Distribution Model).
* Development background.



  





**Location:** 
 Stockholm
 **( On-site )**

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**Start:** 

 November 2024
 




  





**About Us:** 





 MyStamp AB helps businesses build customer loyalty with innovative digital solutions. As we grow fast, we’re looking for a Customer Success Manager to help our clients get the most out of our platform.
 




  





**Role Overview:** 





 As a Customer Success Manager, you will be the main contact for our clients, helping them onboard, solve problems, and reach their goals with our platform. Your job is to ensure long-term satisfaction and success.
 




  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Onboarding:** 

 Help new clients get started and integrate our platform smoothly.
* **Customer Relationships:** 

 Understand clients' needs and help them succeed using MyStamp.
* **Proactive Support:** 

 Check in regularly, provide training, and offer tips for better usage.
* **Issue Resolution:** 

 Solve client issues or escalate them to the relevant teams.
* **Retention & Upsell:** 

 Spot opportunities to offer additional services and work with sales.
* **Data Insights:** 

 Use customer data to identify trends and suggest improvements.
* **Team Collaboration:** 

 Work with sales, product, and support to provide seamless service.
* **Customer Training:** 

 Create resources like webinars to help clients use our platform effectively.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* 2+ years in Customer Success, Account Management, or similar roles, ideally in SaaS/tech.
* Strong communication and relationship-building skills.
* Ability to manage multiple clients and projects.
* Analytical skills to use data for customer insights.
* Problem-solving mindset and proactive approach.
* Experience with CRM and customer success tools.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.



  





**What We Offer:** 



* A chance to make a real impact in a growing company.
* Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
* Opportunities for professional growth.
* Flexible working hours and hybrid options.



  





**How to Apply:** 





 If you’re passionate about helping businesses grow, send your CV and cover letter to
 
 kontakt@mystamp.se
 
 by September 30th 2024.

title: Associate Solution Consultant
description:
Benify is an international HR tech company that provides a market-leading global benefits and total rewards platform. With over 500 Benifyers in 6 countries, we're driving success with over 1,500 customers and about two million users around the world.🌍 We empower people to be the best they can be, while fostering a sustainable and engaging work culture where employees feel engaged and included.
 



  





 Our team of Solution Consultants is growing!
 



**About The Role** 




 The Solution Consultant plays a critical role in the success of any project. They act as a bridge between the client and the internal technical team. They are responsible for engaging with clients and providers alike to gather all relevant requirements needed to design a Benify best practice solution. The design process is a collaborative effort which the Solution Consultant coordinates within the cross-functional project team. Subsequently, it is the Solution Consultant's responsibility to guide the client and provider to the Benify best practice solution.
 



  





 The role involves acting as a subject matter expert on benefits technology and, thereby the benefits market. The Solution Consultant will from time to time be expected to participate in sales opportunities, educate others internally, and be a stakeholder in product development initiatives. Please note, this a junior role.
 



  





**As a Solution Consultant, You Will** 



* Lead calls with clients and benefit providers
* Review requirement specifications
* Guide the internal solution design process within your project team
* Document agreed solutions in our Functional Design specifications
* Create and manage Jira tickets and take part in sprint planning
* Support the build and test process until the solution is fully rolled out.



  





**And You Will Do This By** 



* Building and maintaining good working relations with internal stakeholders, clients, and suppliers
* Becoming the client’s trusted advisor
* Taking ownership of the solution being delivered
* Thinking logically around end-to-end process workflows
* Adhering to Benify best practice solution design.



  





**Do we have you on the hook yet? Great! Here's what we are looking for:** 




**Required** 



* Experience working with technical implementation projects
* Enjoy problem-solving, working in teams, and taking initiative



  





**Desirable** 



* Experience implementing large complex multi-national client-facing technology projects
* Benefits experience from either working for a benefits tech company, implementing benefits tech within your organisation, being a tech-savvy individual in the benefits sector, or a benefits professional within the tech industry (e.g. within a SaaS company or tech startup)



  





 Join a dynamic and innovative SaaS company dedicated to helping employers improve their relationships with employees worldwide. As a Benifyer, you'll enjoy a forward-thinking culture that encourages personal and professional growth. We offer an entrepreneurial environment that values creativity and new ideas, with a commitment to diversity and inclusion. With a nearly gender-balanced team, we prioritize creating a supportive workplace where everyone can thrive.
 



  





 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 We look forward to reading your application!
 



  





 Interested, but not right now? Register your interest here and be notified when we are hiring: https://career.benify.com/connect
 



  





*Please let us know if you need any reasonable adjustments for interviews by replying to the email you will receive after you apply.*

title: Senior Solutions Architect
description:
**Description**
 Amazon Web Services (AWS) isn’t a startup, but we act like one. We innovate, move fast, and disrupt the status quo every day. We have the confidence to pursue the unexpected path and do things differently. At the same time, we’re enabling and inspiring our customers to move into the future. AWS values customer trust above all else. Everything we do is in service of making sure our current and future customers feel comfortable, secure, and happy with their choice to move to the AWS cloud.
   

  

 A Solutions Architect wear two major hats: a trusted entity within the customer’s organization and an advocate on behalf of the customer inside of AWS. Your responsibilities will include: owning the technical engagement and ultimate success around specific implementation projects, developing a deep expertise in the AWS technologies as well as broad know-how around how applications and services are constructed using the AWS platform.
   

  

 We are looking for people that are humble, authentic, value driven and empathic. The culture is strong at Amazon and we are driven by our leadership principles in our day to day work. As a more experienced Solutions Architect, you will be able to have conversations with leaders of companies about their strategy as well as with developers that are doing the implementation. This bridge between business and technology, and being a trusted advisor to the customer, is key to success as a Solutions Architect.
   

  

 In the role of a Senior Solutions Architect, the most important work you do will be together with our customers. The ideal candidate will posses customer facing skills and the ability to have discussions with senior personnel within the company. As well, they have a technical background that enables them to easily interact with software developers and architects. They should also have a demonstrated ability to think structured about business, product, and technical challenges.
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Run technical workshops and advise customers on architectural and strategic IT decisions
* Educate customers on best practices to ensure their solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud
* Work with other AWS teams to drive adoption and revenue
* Capture and share knowledge with our broader Solution Architect community
* Develop technical content (such as blog-posts, white papers and reference architectures) to convey best practices using AWS
* Practice Thought Leadership for AWS at events, user groups, hackathons and online
* Share customer feedback to internal product management and engineering teams to help drive the future of AWS


**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Experience from working as a Solution Architect
* Technical background
* Structured way of working
* Experience from cross team collaboration, internally as well as with external organizations


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Technical degree, preferably in Computer Science
* Working knowledge of software development practices and technologies highly desired
* Experience from Cloud Application Architecture
* Certification in Cloud Computing, i.g. AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate Certification


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2744809

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
Sinch is a global leader in the growing market for Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. We are specialists in allowing businesses to reach everyone on the planet, in seconds or less, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
   

  

 With presence in more than 50 countries, whether you know us or not, you've definitely used our tech. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year.
   

  

 Sinch's core values are Make it Happen, Dream Big, Keep it Simple and Win Together. These values describe how our global organization works and inspire every of our more than 3,000 employees across 55 different countries.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Role and Responsibilities**
 Develop, architect and scale the core infrastructure for Sinch's web applications. Be part of in a small cross functional team that sets its own objectives and goals with responsibility for every stage of product development life cycle from planning and design to implementation, testing, deployment, monitoring and maintenance, you build It you run it.
   

  

 Your work will be focused around the common platform used to that makes up the core of the product line; The code you write will be consumed by used by many different teams and is a key enabler in the product line. You will solve problems across the enterprise, focusing not only on how to deliver a great product today but setting the foundations for the future.
   

  

 Tech Stack: NodeJS, Java, React, Typescript
   

  

**Please apply your resume in English!**
**In Order To Contribute To This Role, You Have**
* A strong software engineering background
* In-depth knowledge of the web platform and ecosystem
* Expertise in modern front-end technologies.
* Solid track record working with Typescript in a professional or open-source setting.
* Experience building services on the backend
* Fluency in English


**Big Plus!**
* Experience using design systems
* Experience making architectural decisions that have high impact
* Experience with Web components and the latest Web APIs
* Experience with AWS, Kubernetes and other cloud native technologies


**Benefits**
 Sinch is a global company composed of people from different countries and cultures. Our benefits adjust regionally to support employees and help them to thrive in every stage of life. We offer valuable benefits and resources, including health and life insurance, a flexible work environment, retirement savings plans, and more.
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 In Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. Our Talent Acquisition team, together with hiring managers and the rest of the interviewing team, persistently work towards identifying the candidates that best fit each open job, based on Sinch' s hiring needs and candidates' career expectations.
   

  

 We encourage applications from strong candidates with relevant professional backgrounds for this role. Not all applicants will meet all job requirements exactly! Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always open to candidates that could bring new ideas and perspectives to Sinch!e

title: Property Systems Support Specialist
description:
**Hotel Distribution Systems, Connectivity and Customer Service are no alien words to you?** 




  





 Join BWH Hotels, where we celebrate what makes each of our hotels unique and the special experiences they offer. As a global hotel chain, we are all about going the extra mile to support our hotels and help them to deliver top-notch guest experiences.
 



  





 Right now, we are looking for a service-savvy superstar who is eager to help our hotels conquer the world of Property and Distribution Systems.
 



  





 If you thrive on making a difference, value personalized service and have a passion for all types of systems we want you to become our next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist.** 




  





**Do you have previous experience with reservations and booking systems and are you now ready to take the next step by supporting and navigating our hotels through the maze of Systems? Would you like to describe yourself as hands-on and pro-active?** 




  





 If the answer is Yes – look no further and apply to become BWH’s next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 .
 



  





 As
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 you are part of the Technology and Distribution Team based in Stockholm.
 



  





 As a person you are a creative problem solver, and you have a passion for all types of systems.
 



  





 You are someone who naturally likes to find solutions, has no difficulty in connecting the dots and likes to help people in any way. In your view, obstacles are only opportunities in disguise.
 



  





 You enjoy working as part of a dynamic team which not only strives to succeed but also values collaboration and celebrates achievements together. You are a team player, pro-active and you like to go the extra mile.
 



  





**Your superpowers** 



* 2-3 years’ experience in hotel operations / hotel reservations and/front office or booking systems
* In depth knowledge of at least one PMS system: Opera | Opera Cloud, Hotsoft, Suite8 or Mews
* Experience in a helpdesk or customer/guest service environment
* Confident to set up and hold training and webinars for our hotels
* Communicate fluently in Swedish and English



  





**Your tasks as a Property Systems Support Specialist** 



* Provide day-to-day support to hotels with any questions related to property and distribution systems
* Play a supporting role during the onboarding of a new BWH franchise property or PMS and complete distribution related tasks during the integration phase of a new Hotel/PMS
* Facilitate and hold trainings/webinars and be the hotel’s go-to person during the first months as a BWH franchise property
* Continually observe day-to-day system status and assure BWH hotels are bookable in all BWH systems and booking channels (OTA, GDS, Brand Web, Direct Connects)
* Assists in the development and documentation of standard operating procedures (SOPs), work instructions, training materials, and checklists
* Take ownership of assigned products and projects



  





**BWH Hotels Scandinavia – local gems everywhere in Scandinavia** 




 BWH Hotels is a leading global hotel network consisting of three hotel chains – WorldHotels Collection, Best Western Hotels & Resorts, and SureStay Hotel Group.
 



  





 Best Western Hotels & Resorts (BWHR) is an iconic hotel chain with over 70 years of experience. Today, BWHR comprises 10 brands with 3- and 4-star hotels. To enhance its offerings, SureStay Hotel Group was also created, featuring three brands in the economy segment.
 



  





 WorldHotels boasts an incredible collection of hotels and resorts in various destinations worldwide, spanning the exclusive and luxurious segments. The acquisition of WorldHotels creates a hotel portfolio with options in every market segment – from economy to luxury.
 



  





 BWH Hotels acts as an umbrella organization for the 18 different brands. This establishes a global network of approximately 4,300 hotels in nearly 100 countries around the world.

title: Key Account Executive, Retail, Google Cloud (English, Swedish)
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 10 years of experience with goals-carrying cloud or software business, or account management at a Business-to-Business software company.
* Experience promoting to enterprise accounts, promoting a portfolio of products or solutions at the C-level.
* Experience working with clients in the global retail industry or similar (as a client/partner).
* Ability to communicate in English and Swedish fluently for collaboration with international and local stakeholders.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* Experience cultivating and maintaining C-level relationships to build partnerships and promote cloud solutions, with the ability to influence at the executive level
* Experience promoting cloud Solutions, Infrastructure Software, Databases, Analytic Tools, or Applications Software in the software and technology industry.
* Experience working with Customer Engineers and customers' technical leads to inventory existing software estate and build business cases for migrations.
* Experience working with customer and Google product organizations, orchestrate, develop, and steer joint roadmaps with clear objectives.
* Experience supporting enterprise organizations, growing existing customer base and acquiring new logos to increase spend and accelerate consumption business.


**About The Job**
 The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are developed for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.
   

  

 As a Key Account Executive (KAE) on the strategic account team for a global retailer, you will serve as a senior executive promoting to one of the most strategic enterprises in Google Cloud. You will leverage existing relationships with C-level executives, developing new relationships with business unit leaders to understand their unique company challenges and to influence their perspective of Google solutions. You will do this with an industry understanding, communicating the business value of Google while driving shareholder value. In this role, you will advocate the innovative power of our products and solutions to make organizations more productive, collaborative, and mobile.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Build and deepen executive relationships with the strategic customer base to influence their long-term technology and business decisions. Add value as a trusted advisor by bringing compelling insights and ideas with follow through execution.
* Lead entire business cycles (i.e., presenting multi-year agreements to C-level executives), discussing terms, and managing associated legal and business risks.
* Lead account strategy to develop business growth opportunities, working cross-functionally with multiple teams and Google Partners, to maximize business impact within enterprise customers.
* Run and manage a global retail account with multiple opportunities across different functions with forecast and budgetary accuracy, serving as the primary customer contact for all adoption-related activities.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Senior IT Architect - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Architects to help our clients on national and international projects!
   

  

 (Senior) IT Architects are part of our consulting teams who focus for instance on tech-oriented analyses, review & specification of IT systems or architectures, technical solution design, process improvement and target architecture definitions.
   

  

 Together with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your technical know-how combined with your analytical and conceptual skillset. Based on your IT project experience, you are able to provide content guidance to and coordinate smaller teams.
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* You will form the digital transformation of globally leading companies, ensuring their success by evaluating our clients' digital capabilities and performing feasibility studies
* You will manage small, agile development teams in strategic IT implementation programs, establish modern practices like DevOps and CI/CD, and be responsible for the technical implementation of crucial digital requirements, such as cyber resilience
* You will analyze, develop, and optimize cutting-edge, customized IT architectures while leading small teams and applying your comprehensive understanding of legacy IT, enterprise solutions, and current market developments and trends such as cloud computing and microservices


**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, or a related discipline with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, management of IT projects, or professional software development
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know that modern tools, such as machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile methods, AI, and robotics aren't just buzzwords - but essential to sustainable IT architectures
* are familiar with popular software development methods and tools
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts - while traveling to our clients in- and outside of your home country
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we cultivate a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer 👾
description:
This is Mevisio
   

  

 Mevisio is a fast-growing scale-up offering a low-code platform that digitizes management and collaboration in the manufacturing industry.
   

  

 We provide a digital alternative to the physical whiteboards traditionally used for daily team meetings on the shop floor, with applications extending to general operations management and other Lean Manufacturing practices. The Mevisio Platform is a tool for leaders and team members to work smarter and more efficiently through visualization and improved communication.
   

  

**🫶 Why Mevisio?**
**Inclusive and friendly yet highly driven culture:** 
 We have high ambitions and understand that the fastest way to success is by working together.
   

  

**Truly cross-functional collaboration:** 
 This gives you the opportunity to have a significant impact on both technology and product.
   

  

**Big enterprise customers:** 
 You’ll have the chance to work in an environment that holds the product to high standards—addressing the kinds of challenges that engineers love, such as scalability, security, quality, and most importantly, creating great products.
   

  

**End-to-end development:** 
 You’ll be involved from ideation to production.
   

  

 Innovation: Participate in a well-defined product discovery process where your team is responsible not only for delivery but also for innovation.
   

  

 ⚙️
 **Desired Technical Skills
   

  

 Language:** 
 High proficiency in TypeScript and asynchronous programming.
   

  

**Frontend:** 
 High proficiency in React, including its ecosystem of frameworks.
   

  

**Service Layer:** 
 High proficiency in Node.js, including frameworks, with a strong understanding of core concepts such as event-driven architecture, the Node event loop, memory management, and asynchronous programming principles.
   

  

**APIs:** 
 Experience of GraphQL and REST.
   

  

**Data/Communication:** 
 Experience of MongoDB, Redis, and AMQP.
   

  

**Cloud:** 
 Experience and interest in AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
   

  

**🧑‍🎓 Extra Merit**
 Experience of programming language design and/or compiler implementation, including parsing and static analysis.
   

  

 Frontend infrastructure, our client-side application is very rich, and we need to continuously improve the underlying infrastructure.
   

  

**🧑‍🤝‍🧑** 
**Teamwork**
 Teamwork is a big part of our success. You thrive in a modern agile environment with a strong focus on collaboration. You will bring your experience with agile methodologies to the team. While we work in a hybrid setting, we enjoy meeting in person a couple of times a week, as we believe that building trust and getting to know each other is key to our team’s success.
   

  

**Other Perks And Benefits**
 🏖️ 30 paid holidays
   

  

 🤸🏻 Attractive wellness contribution
   

  

 📈 Pension plan
   

  

 🔕 Flexible working hours and hybrid office set-up
   

  

 🧑🏾‍💻 New tech gear - got that covered
   

  

 👨‍👩‍👧 Work-life balance
   

  

 ⛷️ Team gatherings
   

  

 🏢 Central Office
   

  

***If you think this sounds cool - don't miss out the chance to meet this fantastic team!***
 Every year, Deloitte ranks Sweden's fifty fastest growing technology companies, in their Sweden Technology Fast 50 list. With a revenue growth of 914% over the last four years, 2018-2021, Mevisio made it to number 34 on the list. Adding to the achievement, the growth has been made with no external funding.
   

  

 – We are glad to see that our hard work has payed off. We are a small, dedicated team that is committed to providing an enterprise grade platform to our customers with the best user experience there is. Our customers have tough requirements when it comes to service delivery and information security—every new customer is an achievement. I'm really proud of the team that has made this possible, says Marcus Wejderot, CEO of Mevisio.

title: Senior Solutions Architect
description:
**Techster Solutions** 
 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst
 **3+** 
 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
 



 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
 



  





 For our client we are looking for
 **Senior Solution Architect** 
 .
 



**Assignment:** 




 Looking for a senior solution architect with specialized competence within cloud development, proficient in test-driven development as well as DevOps. As a Solution Architect for test tools, responsible for designing and overseeing the architecture of the product. Will work closely with product owners, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the test tool is scalable, reliable, and meets the highest standards of quality. As there is a Cloud-first strategy, extensive knowledge of AWS is needed and the ability to work as a senior developer in the teams.
 



  





 Since this is a changing organization and product, there are new areas and legacy systems, ways of working, and fragmented integrations where there can be parallel or conflicting solutions. The candidate must be able to manage stakeholders, be a change leader, and be prepared for challenging discussions and stakeholder management. As part of TRATON, collaborations with sister brands at MAN and Navistar are essential. Experience from software development in a true global setting is vital. Customers can be found in regions such as China where different regulations and laws need to be considered.
 



  





**Scenario:** 




 Current solution: On prem solution for test management system built by compamy used by primarily company users
 



 New solution: Migrate IT-solutions to a cloud based solution accessible from any country where TRATON is present. Secure a strategic roadmap that fits TRATON´s and company´s visions.
 



  





**Tasks and output:** 




 Excerpt of example tasks that the candidate will perform: lead change within the technology, organisation and business, set up good practices and policies, provide advice regarding architecture to the teams on various levels, design our solutions for the future, be a sounding board for the different teams architects as well as the individual developers
 



  





**Remote work:** 
 Wednesdays are today mandatory to be on site. Requirement to be able to be on site 3 days a week minimum. At crucial situations there must be a possibility to work 5 days on site. During our Program Increment Planning weeks (All weeks ending with a 6 meaning 6, 16, 26, 36 and 46) 100% availability is needed.
 



  





**Education:** 




 Master of Science, (other level of education is also acceptable if proven track record of work can match the education level), Scaled Agile Framework, SCRUM
 



  





**Language:** 




 Swedish & English on a professional level (Swedish can be excluded if necessary).
 



  





**Meriting:** 




 API development, Information management, Experience and proficiency in AWS, Test Driven development and Dev Ops
 



 Experience from software tool development preferably related to test management tools.
 



 Experience from operating as solution architect in a true global context
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
 



 Arbetsplats och kultur
 



 Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
 



 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Channel Sales Executive, GFI Software (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, GFI Software. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you ready to step into the future of sales and channel management? The channel management industry often grapples with inefficiencies in scaling operations, maintaining consistent growth, and effectively integrating technology to enhance partner interactions. Many companies still rely on traditional methods that lack data-driven decision-making and advanced analytical capabilities.
   

  

 At GFI, we revolutionize this space by integrating generative AI across all facets of our channel management processes. Our cutting-edge approach not only optimizes operations but also drives sustained revenue growth by enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of our network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs. This is an electrifying opportunity to be at the forefront of tech-driven sales innovation, leveraging AI to transform standard practices into dynamic, strategic engagements that deliver measurable results.
   

  

 This role is not your typical channel sales role. You will be expected to master and deploy Generative AI tools, ensuring our partnerships are not just maintained but also optimized and expanded through strategic data-driven methodologies. Your work will involve rigorous partner recruitment, dynamic training sessions, and stringent performance assessments—all enhanced by advanced AI.
   

  

 You'll fit into a team of forward-thinkers where each member is crucial in sculpting the future landscape of channel sales. Your role is pivotal in shaping how partnerships flourish in a tech-driven environment, ensuring both the growth of GFI and our partners. If you are eager to redefine industry standards and possess a robust blend of generative AI proficiency, professional communication, and channel sales management, we encourage you to apply. Join us in transforming the blueprint of channel management and take your place as a leader in a cutting-edge sales revolution.
   

  

 NOTE: If you receive an interview invitation, it is expected that you conduct in-depth research into GFI's products and business model beforehand.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Partner Recruitment and Onboarding: Identifying, recruiting, and onboarding new partners to expand the channel network. This involves evaluating potential partners' alignment with the company's values and goals, as well as their market reach and capabilities.
* Training and Development: Providing partners with the necessary training and resources to effectively sell and support the product. This includes product training, sales techniques, and ongoing professional development to enhance their capabilities.
* Performance Monitoring and Management: Continuously monitoring the performance of partners against predefined benchmarks and metrics. This includes regular assessment of sales figures, customer feedback, and other performance indicators to identify areas for improvement.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Directly selling to end-user customers
* Prioritizing the quantity of interactions over the quality of your engagements with partners
* Worrying about unpredictable earnings and relentless travel demands


**Channel Sales Executive Key Responsibilities**
* Sustained revenue growth from efficiently managing and optimizing a network of distributors, resellers, and MSPs using GenerativeAI tools


**Basic Requirements**
* Advanced generative AI proficiency (i.e., use of multiple AI tools, ability to automate workflows and custom GPTs); if you've only used LLMs for research, learning, brainstorming, or content generation, that will be deemed insufficient
* 1+ year of indirect channel sales experience in the software industry (direct sales experience does not count)


**About GFI Software**
 GFI Software develops essential applications for small and medium businesses. Over 80,000 customers choose GFI solutions for network management and performance, security, and collaboration applications. GFI Software available through thousands of channel partners dedicated to serving specific countries and regions worldwide.
   

  

 GFI has a fully remote, global workforce. GFI has partnered with Crossover to administer its hiring and global workforce management.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5278-SE-Stockhol-ChannelSalesEx.003

title: Data Protection Specialist for Vattenfall BA Wind
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Are you interested in a job where you can positively influence the success of a growing organisation dedicated to renewable energy? Are you motivated by building networks and driving improvement forward? If so, this is the position for you.
   

  

 The role of the
 **Risk, Project and Legal Governance** 
 department is to support strategy execution through robust frameworks for decision making, management of risks and uncertainties, compliance and legal governance. A key role within the team is that of
 **Data Protection Specialist** 
 .
   

  

 As the Data Protection Specialist, you are responsible for defining and establishing data protection standards in BA Wind and driving compliance-related activities.
   

  

*Key responsibilities include:*
* Inform and advise Business Area Wind and its employees about obligations to comply with the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR) and other data protection laws.
* Oversee training of BA Wind employees.
* Develop and implement privacy control framework for BA Wind.
* Monitor implementation of policies, procedures and guidelines.
* Monitor and report compliance with data protection legislation.
* Perform investigations into data protection breaches and undertake reporting and remedial action as needed.
* Manage data subject requests.
* Establish BA standards for data protection agreements.
* Ensure legally required documentation is in place and updated.
* Ensure high risk processing activities are identified, analysed, managed and documented by risk owners.
* Provide advice on mitigating risks around data protection processing activities.
* Provide advice following data processing audits and data breaches.
* Develop the culture and ethos of data compliance across BA Wind
* Act as the contact point on high-risk issues related to the processing of personal data and providing information as requested to BA Wind /Vattenfall on compliance in this area.


**Be in your element with BA Wind**
 The Vattenfall
 **Business Area Wind** 
 develops and operates renewable energy projects (offshore wind, onshore wind, solar and battery) in our core markets. Business Area Wind is also responsible for identifying profitable growth options and new business models for other renewable energy sources, developing solutions for energy system integration and finding new ways of working with communities. The combination of rapid growth and a highly competitive market environment requires best in class project management and a culture of continuous learning. Working as part of a leading European utility also means you could be helping a growing number of major businesses and brands achieve their own sustainability goals through partnerships.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

* A bachelor’s degree (or similar) in law, compliance, corporate governance or other relevant field
* At least 5 years work experience in a large international corporation in the corporate governance or compliance area
* A deep understanding of GDPR and data protection in the UK and EU with at least 3 years proven experience in the field
* You thrive on solving complex challenges in complex stakeholder environment.
* Visible and self-managing and able to work effectively as part of a virtual team
* A strong communicator with excellent command of English both verbally and written; German is a plus.
* Ability to deal with urgent topics and focus on what is important
* Ability to build a positive culture around data protection.
* Strong interpersonal and collaborative skills
* Strong analytical skills and ability to work in a structured way.


**Location**
 The possible locations for this position are Amsterdam, Hamburg, Hexham, London or Stockholm. Regular business trips are required.
   

  

 Mer information
   

  

 We welcome your application in English, including CV and cover letter, the last day to apply is
 **13th October 2024** 
 . We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website. Selection and interviews will take place after the last application date.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**
 For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact recruiter Catalina Roa Rodriguez, catalina.roarodriguez@vattenfall.com .
   

  

**Trade union representatives in Sweden**
 Rolf Ohlsson (Akademikerna), Anders Bohlin (Unionen), Christer Gustafsson (Ledarna), Rebecka Hedsell (SEKO). To contact the representatives, please call Vattenfall's switchboard, +46 0 739 50 00.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to building a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Click here for further information
   

  

*Since Vattenfall is part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our positions are security classed. If this position is security classed, the final candidates may be subject to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.*
 The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening may be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall. The screening will be performed by a third party, Validata.
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is a leading European energy company driving the transition to a sustainable energy system. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years and now have a mission of working for fossil freedom. We employ around 21 000 people mostly in our core markets in Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK.

title: Principal Solutions Sales Executive - Manage Security Solutions
description:
**Are you committed to the security of the future of digital infrastructure?**
*Do you have the expertise to design and sell security solutions that protect our customers’ most valuable assets? Join GlobalConnect as a Principal Solutions Sales Executive – Security Solutions, where your knowledge meets the* 
 opportunity
 *to safeguard the digital infrastructure of the future.*
 As a Principal Solutions Sales Executive focusing on Security Solutions at GlobalConnect, you will play a critical role in protecting the digital landscapes of our customers. You will be part of a newly established and growing initiative, central to GlobalConnect’s growth journey and advanced goals in the security domain. Your deep technical knowledge of security solutions, combined with your sales skills, will empower you to craft and sell comprehensive solutions tailored to the unique needs of our clients. You will take charge of a portfolio, both hunting for new opportunities and improving existing relationships, ensuring that our customers are equipped with the best possible defenses for their digital infrastructure.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Create and manage a portfolio of high-value clients, focusing on building long-term relationships and achieving sales targets in the security domain.
* Assess customer challenges and design tailored security strategies that address their specific needs, using your deep understanding of vendors and products to find price-optimal solutions for our customers.
* Collaborate with Solution Management to ensure the technical soundness and commercial viability of your proposed security solutions.
* Engage in high-level discussions with C-suite executives and technical teams to build trust and convey the value of our security solutions.
* Facilitate the entire sales cycle, from the first meeting, to identifying customer needs to delivering comprehensive security solutions.
* Keep up to date with the latest security needs and products, conveying customer needs and information to the product organization for further development.


**Why GlobalConnect?** 
 At GlobalConnect, we are committed to making a difference in the digital world. As part of a new and strategically important team, you will have the unique opportunity to shape the future of our security investment. Your role will involve selling and applying effective solutions that safeguard our clientele and support our strategy to broaden our footprint across the Nordic countries. At GlobalConnect, your expertise will be recognized and developed, allowing you to grow alongside us as we continue to expand our reach.
   

  

**To excel in this role, you need:**
* Deep technical knowledge in security solutions, with experience in solutions from leading vendors like Cisco, Palo Alto, and Fortinet.
* A proven history of sales, particularly in high-value B2B security solutions.
* The ability to engage in strategic problem-solving and design comprehensive security architectures.
* Strong business acumen, capable of translating complex security concepts into clear, compelling narratives.


 Suppose you are excited about securing the future of digital infrastructure and eager to protect our customers' most critical assets. In that case, we invite you to apply and become a part of the GlobalConnect team. Together, we can secure a safer tomorrow.
